subject: It's b-a-n-a-n-a-s!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Just about yelling it now. Reversed "cuz we're gonna make you a spirit--(or
regret it-?)".  Maybe I hear/think/wanna believe too much.

F-S

Jus abou yelling i now. Re e sed "cuz we' e gonna make you a spi i --(o eg e i -?)".  Maybe I hea / hink/wanna belie e  oo much. 
 
F-S
